div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Deal 4 damage. This attack ignores armor (armor-piercing). Basic Dwarven attack.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Deal 5 damage plus your current Heat (max +2 damage). Forge-heated strike.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Deal 6 damage. This attack ignores armor. Generate 2 Heat. If you have 3+ Heat, deal 8 damage instead.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Deal 6 damage. Gain 1 Heat. Ancient Dwarven combat technique.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Block 2 damage when you would take Component Damage. This does not prevent the Component Damage itself. Dwarven resilience.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Passive: Reduce all damage you take by 1. This stacks with Component Damage resistance. Dwarven fortitude.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Whenever you generate Heat, deal 1 damage to target enemy within 3 hexes. Dwarven-exclusive sigil.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Remove up to 3 Heat. Draw 1 card. Forge safety mechanism.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: You can have up to 12 Heat before overheating (instead of 10). Heat Sink equipment.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Your next attack deals +2 damage. Gain 1 Heat. The forge empowers your strike.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
